metadata.dcterms:title: ANHA4-EJM007A (ICB_no heat flux)
metadata.dcterms:creator: Juliana Marini Marson
metadata.dcterms:description:
NEMO version: 3.4
LIM version: 2
Atmospheric Forcing: CGRF
Runoff: Interannual Monthly with Greenland Melt
Open Boundary Condition: GLORYS2V3
Initial Condition: GLORYS2V3
Output frequency: 5 days
Others: Bamber et al. (2012) for Greenland runoff, 46% of discharge in liquid form, 54% in iceberg form; vertical mixing enhanced for runoff from 0 - 30 m; bergy bits set to 0.3; no latent heat flux from icebergs; vertically-integrated ocean forcing of icebergs (Merino et al., 2016); iceberg field initialized in equilibrium (used previous 2015 outputs as "initial condition").
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
ANHA4 v3.4, Bamber et al. (2012) with icebergs, no iceberg heat flux
